description.p: You imbue a landmark with profane magic, permanently turning it into a necromantic beacon of undeath.
All the land within 6 miles of the beacon is cursed. Any burial grounds in the area are immediately overrun with the rising of the dead in the form of zombies or skeletons.
These undead are not under your control, but will savagely attack anyone they find.
Anyone who dies in this cursed area immediately rises again as a zombie.
